InfoTab.Title: Info
InfoTab.SetupGuideIntro: For assistance with general setup for both AutoDuty and it's dependencies, be sure to check out the setup guide below for more information:
InfoTab.PathStatusInfo: The above guide also has information on the status of each path, such as Path maturity, module maturity, and general consistency of each path. You can also review additional notes or considerations, that may need to be made on your part for successful looping. For requests, issues, or contributions to AD, please use the AutoDuty Github to open an issue:
InfoTab.DiscordInvite: For everything else, join the discord!
InfoTab.CombatPluginsNote: Hotly debated, pick your favorite. You can configure it in the config

PluginDesc.AntiAFK: keeps you from being marked as afk
PluginDesc.AutoRetainer: can be triggered, does GC delivery and discarding
